name: proteinase 3

reactome.name: Common Pathway of Fibrin Clot Formation

summary: Enables enzyme binding activity; serine-type endopeptidase activity; and signaling receptor binding activity. Involved in several processes, including mature conventional dendritic cell differentiation; membrane protein ectodomain proteolysis; and neutrophil extravasation. Located in azurophil granule lumen; cytosol; and plasma membrane raft. Colocalizes with plasma membrane. [provided by Alliance of Genome Resources, Apr 2022]
